test_cases.title: Create Standard Purchase Order - Positive Flow
test_cases.description: Verify that a procurement user can create a standard PO with all required fields and save it successfully.
preconditions: Vendor, material, plant master data exist
test_steps: Enter valid vendor, material, quantity, price, plant, and delivery date
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created with a unique identifier, no FI document is posted, PO appears in PO history report.

test_cases.title: Create Standard Purchase Order - Missing Mandatory Field
test_cases.description: Verify that PO creation fails if a mandatory field (e.g., vendor) is missing.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for missing mandatory field, PO is not created.

test_cases.title: Create Standard Purchase Order - Invalid Quantity
test_cases.description: Verify that PO creation fails if quantity is zero or negative.
preconditions: Vendor, material, plant master data exist
test_steps: Enter valid vendor, material, price, plant, delivery date
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for invalid quantity, PO is not created.

test_cases.title: Create Standard Purchase Order - Boundary Quantity
test_cases.description: Verify that PO creation works for minimum valid quantity (e.g., 1).
preconditions: Vendor, material, plant master data exist
test_steps: Enter all required fields with quantity as 1
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created successfully with quantity 1.

test_cases.title: PO Creation - No FI Document Posted
test_cases.description: Verify that no FI document is posted upon PO creation.
preconditions: Vendor, material, plant master data exist
test_steps: Check FI document postings for the PO
test_cases.expected_results: No FI document is posted for the PO creation event.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Release Strategy Positive Flow
test_cases.description: Verify that a PO is routed for approval based on predefined thresholds and can be approved by authorized user.
test_cases.expected_results: PO status changes to 'Approved', PO is available for further processing.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Unauthorized User
test_cases.description: Verify that a user without approval role cannot approve a PO.
preconditions: User does not have approval role
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks approval action and displays authorization error.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Rejection Flow
test_cases.description: Verify that an authorized approver can reject a PO and status is updated accordingly.
test_cases.expected_results: PO status changes to 'Rejected', PO cannot be used for further processing.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Threshold Routing
test_cases.description: Verify that PO is routed to correct approver based on value threshold.
preconditions: PO created with value above threshold
test_steps: Create PO with value exceeding threshold
test_cases.expected_results: PO is routed to appropriate approver per release strategy.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Unapproved PO Usage
test_cases.description: Verify that unapproved POs cannot be used for GR or IR processing.
test_steps: Attempt to post GR referencing unapproved PO
Attempt to post IR referencing unapproved PO
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks GR and IR posting for unapproved PO.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt - Full Receipt
test_cases.description: Verify that warehouse user can post a full goods receipt against an approved PO.
test_steps: Enter received quantity equal to ordered quantity
test_cases.expected_results: GR is posted, inventory updated, FI document generated, GR appears in PO history and GR status report.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt - Partial Receipt
test_cases.description: Verify that warehouse user can post a partial goods receipt against an approved PO.
test_steps: Enter received quantity less than ordered quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Partial GR is posted, inventory updated, FI document generated, open quantity tracked.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt - Over Receipt
test_cases.description: Verify that system prevents posting GR for quantity greater than ordered.
test_steps: Enter received quantity greater than ordered
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents over receipt.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt - Multiple Partial Receipts
test_cases.description: Verify that multiple partial GRs can be posted until PO is fully received.
test_steps: Continue until ordered quantity is received
test_cases.expected_results: System allows multiple GRs, tracks remaining open quantity, prevents over receipt.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt - FI Document Generation
test_cases.description: Verify that FI document is automatically generated upon GR posting.
test_cases.expected_results: FI document is posted with correct GL accounts, document number linked to GR.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt - FI Document Visibility
test_cases.description: Verify that FI document for GR is visible in financial reports.
test_steps: Search for FI document linked to GR
test_cases.expected_results: FI document for GR is visible and correctly posted.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt - Manual FI Posting Not Allowed
test_cases.description: Verify that manual FI posting is not required or allowed for GR.
test_steps: Attempt manual FI posting for GR
test_cases.expected_results: System does not allow manual FI posting for standard GR transaction.

test_cases.title: Invoice Receipt - Positive Flow
test_cases.description: Verify that accounts payable user can post vendor invoice referencing PO and GR.
test_steps: Enter invoice details matching PO and GR
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is posted, linked to PO and GR, status updated.

test_cases.title: Invoice Receipt - Invoice Quantity Exceeds GR
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice with quantity greater than GR is blocked for payment.
test_steps: Enter invoice quantity greater than GR quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked for payment, status indicates discrepancy.

test_cases.title: Invoice Receipt - Price Difference Within Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice with price difference within tolerance is posted without manual intervention.
test_steps: Enter invoice price within tolerance limit
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is posted and cleared automatically.

test_cases.title: Invoice Receipt - Price Difference Exceeds Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice with price difference exceeding tolerance is blocked for payment.
test_steps: Enter invoice price exceeding tolerance limit
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked for payment, flagged for review.

test_cases.title: Invoice Receipt - Blocked Invoice Reason
test_cases.description: Verify that users can view the reason for invoice blocking due to discrepancies.
preconditions: Invoice blocked due to quantity/price discrepancy
test_cases.expected_results: Blocking reason is clearly indicated in the system.

test_cases.title: Invoice Receipt - Blocked Invoice Cannot Be Paid
test_cases.description: Verify that blocked invoices cannot be paid until released.
test_steps: Attempt to process payment for blocked invoice
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents payment processing for blocked invoice.

test_cases.title: Invoice Receipt - FI Document Generation
test_cases.description: Verify that FI document is automatically generated upon invoice posting.
test_cases.expected_results: FI document is posted with correct GL accounts, document number linked to invoice.

test_cases.title: Invoice Receipt - FI Document Visibility
test_cases.description: Verify that FI document for invoice is visible in financial reports.
test_steps: Search for FI document linked to invoice
test_cases.expected_results: FI document for invoice is visible and correctly posted.

test_cases.title: GR/IR Account Clearing - Positive Flow
test_cases.description: Verify that GR/IR account is credited at GR and debited at IR, and cleared for matched transactions.
preconditions: GR and IR posted for same PO line
test_steps: Post IR for same PO and GR
test_cases.expected_results: GR/IR account is cleared for matched transactions.

test_cases.title: GR/IR Account Clearing - Unmatched Items
test_cases.description: Verify that open GR/IR balances are reported for unmatched items.
test_cases.expected_results: Open GR/IR balance is reported for unmatched item.

test_cases.title: Real-Time FI Integration - Immediate Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that all P2P transactions trigger immediate FI postings.
test_steps: Check FI postings after each transaction
test_cases.expected_results: FI postings are created immediately after each transaction.

test_cases.title: Real-Time FI Integration - Compliance
test_cases.description: Verify that all FI postings comply with company accounting standards.
test_cases.expected_results: FI postings use correct GL accounts and comply with standards.

test_cases.title: Compliant FI Postings - Audit Log
test_cases.description: Verify that all FI postings are documented and traceable to source transactions.
test_steps: Check audit logs for FI postings
test_cases.expected_results: All FI postings are traceable to source transactions in audit logs.

test_cases.title: Compliant FI Postings - No Manual Adjustments
test_cases.description: Verify that no manual adjustments are needed for standard P2P transactions.
test_cases.expected_results: No manual adjustments required for standard transactions.

test_cases.title: View PO History - All Events
test_cases.description: Verify that PO history includes creation, approval, GR, and IR events.
preconditions: PO created, approved, GR and IR posted
test_cases.expected_results: PO history displays all relevant events with timestamps.

test_cases.title: View PO History - Search and Filter
test_cases.description: Verify that users can search and filter PO history by various criteria.
test_cases.expected_results: PO history is filtered and displayed as per criteria.

test_cases.title: View Goods Receipt and Invoice Status
test_cases.description: Verify that users can view current status of GR and IR for each PO.
test_steps: Login as procurement or finance user
test_cases.expected_results: Status reflects complete, partial, or pending for GR and IR.

test_cases.title: View Goods Receipt and Invoice Status - Blocked Invoice
test_cases.description: Verify that blocked invoices are clearly indicated in status reports.
test_steps: Login as procurement or finance user
test_cases.expected_results: Blocked invoices are clearly marked in the report.

test_cases.title: View GR/IR Account Balances - Report Generation
test_cases.description: Verify that users can generate GR/IR balance reports by period.
test_steps: Generate GR/IR balance report for selected period
test_cases.expected_results: Report displays GR/IR balances for the period.

test_cases.title: View GR/IR Account Balances - Filter
test_cases.description: Verify that GR/IR balance reports can be filtered by vendor, material, or plant.
test_cases.expected_results: Report displays filtered GR/IR balances.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access Control - Authorized Access
test_cases.description: Verify that users can only access functions permitted by their role.
test_cases.expected_results: Access is allowed only for permitted functions; unauthorized actions are blocked.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access Control - Unauthorized Action Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that unauthorized actions are blocked and logged.
test_steps: Login as user without required role
test_cases.expected_results: Action is blocked and logged for audit.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access Control - Audit Role Assignment
test_cases.description: Verify that role assignments can be audited.
test_cases.expected_results: Role assignments are documented and auditable.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties - Procurement User Cannot Post FI
test_cases.description: Verify that procurement users cannot post FI documents.
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks FI posting for procurement user.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties - Finance User Cannot Create PO
test_cases.description: Verify that finance users cannot create or approve POs.
test_steps: Attempt to create or approve PO
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks PO creation/approval for finance user.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties - Conflicting Role Assignment
test_cases.description: Verify that system prevents assignment of conflicting roles to a single user.
test_steps: Attempt to assign procurement and finance roles to same user
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents conflicting role assignment.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties - Violation Reporting
test_cases.description: Verify that segregation of duties violations are reported.
test_cases.expected_results: Violation is reported for review.

test_cases.title: Track Procurement and Financial Impact - Real-Time Reporting
test_cases.description: Verify that all P2P transactions are reflected in reports immediately after posting.
test_steps: Access procurement and financial impact reports
test_cases.expected_results: Reports show updated data immediately after transaction posting.

test_cases.title: Track Procurement and Financial Impact - Consistency
test_cases.description: Verify that data is consistent across procurement and FI modules.
test_cases.expected_results: Data is consistent across both modules.

test_cases.title: No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close - Identification
test_cases.description: Verify that system identifies open GR/IR items at period close.
test_cases.expected_results: System identifies and lists open GR/IR items.

test_cases.title: No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close - Tolerance Flagging
test_cases.description: Verify that balances within tolerance are flagged as acceptable.
test_steps: Review GR/IR items flagged within tolerance
test_cases.expected_results: Balances within tolerance are flagged as acceptable.

test_cases.title: No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close - Exceeding Tolerance Reporting
test_cases.description: Verify that balances exceeding tolerance are reported for action.
preconditions: Open GR/IR items exceeding tolerance exist
test_cases.expected_results: Balances exceeding tolerance are reported for action.

test_cases.title: No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close - Drill Down
test_cases.description: Verify that users can drill down to transaction details for open GR/IR items.
preconditions: Open GR/IR items exist at period close
test_cases.expected_results: Users can view detailed transaction information for open items.

summary: 50 comprehensive test cases have been generated to cover all user stories and requirements for SAP S/4HANA Greenfield P2P process, including positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for PO creation and approval, GR and IR processing, FI integration, reporting, controls, and audit compliance.
